attributes.action: Not permit discrimination against men or whites in the Equality Bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Equality means equality! Allowing jobs to be given to people on the basis of sex or race is unfair. It is rightfully illegal to discriminate against females and thnic minorities so it should remain illegal to discriminate against white males. Jobs should be awarded to the best candidate, full stop!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
